system.requirements: Tier 3: Astropath E.Adv, Fellowship 40, Willpower 50. Aptitudes: Fellowship
system.effect: Before making a Focus Power test to manifest a power of the Telepathy Discipline or provided by the Astropath Elite Advance, the Astropath's can spend a Fate Point to increase their Psy Rating by half their Willpower Bonus (rounded down) for that test.

description.value: Before making a Focus Power test to manifest a power of the Telepathy Discipline or provided by the Astropath Elite Advance, the Astropath's can spend a Fate Point to increase their Psy Rating by half their Willpower Bonus (rounded down) for that test.
